comments.message:
Patch Set 1: Ok-To-Test+1

User approved, CI ok to start
Uploaded patch set 2: Patch Set 1 was rebased.

Patch Set 2: Ok-To-Test+1

User approved, CI ok to start

Patch Set 2: Code-Review+2

This is now tested with Witherspoon and Tiogapass. I had to backport one uboot fix for compile due to my system having a newer GCC.
Change has been successfully merged by Brad Bishop
